ValidationRule.description: US-0007670 - Validation Rule to Capture DMC Commitment Date
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR($Profile.Name='GCX Profile',$Profile.Name='Standard User Profile',$Profile.Name='GCX Partner Profile') , RecordType.DeveloperName='ManagedPayment' , ISPICKVAL( EBH_Stage__c , 'Merchant Agreement'), OR( ISBLANK( EBH_DMCInterestedCommittedDate__c ) ,EBH_DMCInterestedCommittedDate__c < TODAY() ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: In order to update stage to Seller Agreement the seller's committed 'Preboarding/Pre-registration' date must be greater than today and recorded in the field DMC Interested/DMC Committed Date
